summon.name: Espírito Urso
summon.description: Invoca um poderoso Espírito Urso companheiro

return.name: Retornar
return.description: Teleporta o Espírito Urso de volta para o Druida

rabid.name: Raiva
rabid.description: Aumenta o ataque e o movimento do Druida e do Espírito Urso

passive.name: Sinergia
passive.description: Aumenta a sinergia entra o Druida e o Espírito Urso

ult.name: Forma Real
ult.description: O Duida se tranforma em um urso furioso

cry.name: Battle Cry
cry.description: Aumenta o ataque do Druida e do Espírito Urso

transform.name: Druid Form
transform.description: O Druida volta a sua forma humana

slow.name: Explosão Cristalina
slow.description: Uma explosão de gelo que causa dano e diminui a velocidade dos inimigos

aura.name: Aura Arcana
aura.description: O jogador compra uma carta a mais por turno

freeze.name: Congelamento
freeze.description: Congela uma unidade inimiga, que pode se mover ou atacar e recebe dano por turno

ult.name: Freezing Field
ult.description: Rylai channels icy explosions around her!

burn.name: Mana Break
burn.description: Everytime Antimage attacks enemy player loses a skill card of the attaked hero

passive.name: Spell Shield
passive.description: Reduces all magic damage by half

blink.name: Blink
blink.description: Teleport Anti Mage to the target spot

ult.name: Mana Void
ult.description: Damages area around an enemy for twice the number of cards the enemy player could have in his hand

stun.name: Wraithfire Blast
stun.description: Stun and then damage over time and slows an enemy

lifesteal.name: Vampiric Aura
lifesteal.description: Drain the life of enemy on every attack

ult.name: Reincarnation
ult.description: No one can kill the Wraith King!

illuminate.name: Illuminate
illuminate.description: Channels light to damage enemies in a line

leak.name: Mana Leak
leak.description: Curse a target causing a skill card loss on every move, stuns if there are no more cards of that hero

mana.name: Chakra Magic
mana.description: Gives the player two skill cards

ult.name: Spirit Form
ult.description: Ezalor becomes one with the light!

illuminate-ult.name: Illuminate
illuminate-ult.description: Summon a spirit to channel light to damage enemies in a line

blind.name: Blinding Light
blind.description: Knock back and blind enemies, causing them to miss attacks

recall.name: Recall
recall.description: If unharmed after enemy turn, target is teleported to a free spot near Ezalor

hook.name: Meat Hook
hook.description: Launches a bloody hook that will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit to Pudge and dealing damage if enemy

rot.name: Rot
rot.description: A toxic cloud that deals intense damage to himself and enemies around

passive.name: Flesh Heap
passive.description: Reduces magic damage and gives Pudge bonus HP, damage and regen on every kill

ult.name: Dismember
ult.description: Channels to disable and deal damage over time to an enemy

stun.name: Impale
stun.description: Rock spikes burst along a straight path, hitted enemies are stunned and take damage

burn.name: Mana Burn
burn.description: Damages an enemy unit by a multiplier of it's mana and makes enemy player lose a card of that hero

spike.name: Spiked Carapace
spike.description: Reflects and negates damage received, while stunning the source of damage

ult.name: Vendetta
ult.description: Nyx Assassin becomes invisible and gains bonus on next attack
